channel.title: Looking for a hoster
channel.description: Hey, i own a 317 server but am no longer able to host. If somebody is willing to host for me you will receive co owner of the server. Pm me or add me on msn(Diablo_56_98@hotmail.com) Being able to at least code basic stuff is perferred.
